櫛.definition: comb; to comb; to weed out; to eliminate; Taiwan pr. [jie2]

櫛孔扇貝.definition: Farrer's scallop (Chlamys farreri), aka Chinese scallop

櫛比.definition: lined up close (like teeth of a comb)

櫛瓜.definition: (Tw) zucchini; courgette; baby marrow; Taiwan pr. [jie2gua1]

櫛風沐雨.definition: lit. to comb one's hair in the wind and wash it in the rain (idiom); fig. to work in the open regardless of the weather
